cv_format_type_full_1:
Senior IT Infrastructure Manager
TechVision Solutions (Pty) Ltd, Johannesburg
job_duties_1:
• Leading a team of 12 IT professionals managing enterprise infrastructure for 500+ users
• Spearheaded migration of on-premise systems to AWS cloud, reducing operational costs by 35%
• Implemented comprehensive cybersecurity framework, reducing security incidents by 60%
• Designed and deployed disaster recovery solutions with 99.9% uptime SLA
• Managed annual IT budget of R8.5 million with consistent cost optimization
• Mentored junior staff and conducted technical training programs
• Collaborated with C-level executives on digital transformation initiatives

IT Systems Administrator

job_duties_2:

• Implemented automated backup and monitoring solutions using Veeam and Nagios
• Led server virtualization project using VMware, consolidating 40 physical servers
• Managed Active Directory, Exchange Server, and enterprise networking equipment
• Provided Level 3 technical support and resolved critical infrastructure issues
• Coordinated with vendors for hardware procurement and software licensing
• Documented IT processes and maintained comprehensive system documentation
